<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hook 'Em](/Feats.aspx?ID=4147) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 80</row>

**Archetype** [Pirate](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=70)

**Prerequisites**
[Pirate Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2032)

**Access**
Members of the Firebrands at the rank of second mark or higher have access to this feat.

**Requirements**
A rope is within your reach, or you have a [rope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=44) or [grappling](/Traits.aspx?ID=184) weapon in your hand.

</column>

---

The Salt Breakers learned to use whatever they could during the Vidric Revolution, and they quickly mastered the art of making a rope into a useful tool in combat. You take hold of a nearby rope, throw a rope from your hand, or fire a grappling weapon at a solid surface—and then swing up to twice your Speed. If you end your movement next to an enemy, attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) that enemy, tying them up in your rope.
